options.label: Get Bnb Balance for a Single Address
options.name: getBnbBalance
options.description: Returns the Bnb balance of a given address.

options.label: Get Bnb Balance for Multiple Addresses(separated by a comma)
options.name: getBnbBalanceMulti
options.description: Returns the Bnb balance of the addresses(each address separated by a comma) entered.

options.label: Get transactions
options.name: getTransactions
options.description: Returns the list of transactions performed by an address, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get internal transactions
options.name: getInternalTransactions
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed by an address, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get internal transactions by hash
options.name: getInternalTransactionsByHash
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed within a transaction.

options.label: Get internal transactions by block
options.name: getInternalTransactionsByBlock
options.description: Returns the list of internal transactions performed within a block range, with optional pagination.

options.label: Get list of Blocks Validated by Address
options.name: getBlocksValidated
options.description: Returns the list of blocks validated by an address.

options.label: Get Contract ABI
options.name: getAbi
options.description: Returns the contract Application Binary Interface ( ABI ) of a verified smart contract.

options.label: Get Contract Source Code
options.name: getContractSourceCode
options.description: Returns the Solidity source code of a verified smart contract.

options.label: Check Transaction Receipt Status
options.name: getTransactionReceiptStatus
options.description: Returns the status code of a transaction execution.

options.label: Get BEP-20 Token Circulating Supply by ContractAddress
options.name: getBep20TokenCirculatingSupply
options.description:
Returns the current circulating supply of a BEP-20 token. 
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get BEP20 Token Supply
options.name: getBep20TokenSupply
options.description:
Returns the total supply of a BEP-20 token. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get BEP20 Token Balance
options.name: getBep20TokenBalance
options.description:
Returns the current balance of a BEP-20 token of an address. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Historical BEP-20 Token TotalSupply by ContractAddress & BlockNo [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalBep20TokenSupply
options.description:
Returns the historical amount of a BEP-20 token in circulation at a certain block height. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Historical BEP-20 Token Account Balance by ContractAddress & BlockNo [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalBep20TokenBalance
options.description:
Returns the balance of a BEP-20 token of an address at a certain block height. The result is returned in the token's smallest decimal representation.
                        Eg. a token with a balance of 215.241526476136819398 and 18 decimal places will be returned as 215241526476136819398

options.label: Get Token Info [PRO]
options.name: getTokenInfo
options.description: Returns project information and social media links of an BEP-20/ERC-721 token.

options.label: Get BNB Price
options.name: getBnbPrice
options.description: Returns the latest price of 1 BNB.

options.label: Get Historical BNB Price [PRO]
options.name: getHistoricalBnbPrice
options.description: Returns the historical price of BNB.

inputParameters.label: Block Number
inputParameters.name: blockno
inputParameters.description: the block number to check balance for eg. 2000000

inputParameters.label: Start Block
inputParameters.name: startBlock
inputParameters.description: the block number to start searching for transactions

inputParameters.label: End Block
inputParameters.name: endBlock
inputParameters.description: the block number to stop searching for transactions

inputParameters.label: Page
inputParameters.name: page
inputParameters.description: the page number, if pagination is enabled

inputParameters.label: Offset
inputParameters.name: offset
inputParameters.description: the number of transactions displayed per page

inputParameters.label: Transaction Hash
inputParameters.name: txhash
inputParameters.description: the string representing the transaction hash to check for internal transactions

inputParameters.label: Contract Address
inputParameters.name: contractAddress
inputParameters.description: the contract address of the BEP-20 token
